## Part a)

```{r}
rateParam = 1/5

time <- 0
arrivalTimes <- NULL  #not the most efficient way to do this in terms of memory
while(time < 100)
{
	waitTime <- rexp(1, rate = rateParam)
	time <- time + waitTime
	arrivalTimes <- c(arrivalTimes, time)
}

plot(arrivalTimes, seq(1, length(arrivalTimes)), type = 's')


```
